//MIRROR MYSELF-mirror image of some text
//http://www.codechef.com/problems/CYW05

#include"stdio.h"
#include"string.h"
#include"stdlib.h"
int main(){
	char txt[505],c,ans[500][505],count=-1;
	int l,i,j;
	while(scanf("%s",txt)!=EOF){
		*(txt)+=32;
		l=strlen(txt);
		if(l%2==0) j=l/2;
		else j=l/2+1;
		for(i=0;i<l/2;i++,j++){
			c=*(txt+i);
			*(txt+i)=*(txt+j);
			*(txt+j)=c;
		}
		*(txt)-=32;
		count++;
		strcpy(ans[count],txt);
		//printf("%s\n",ans[count]);
	}
	while(count>=0){
		printf("%s\n",ans[count]);
		count--;
	}
	return 0;
}
